text: Wikimedia Bangladesh Foundation (aka Wikimedia Bangladesh or WikimediaBD) is a registered charity established in Bangladesh who work to support volunteers on Wikimedia projects such as Wikipedia. It is a Wikimedia chapter approved by the Wikimedia Foundation. It has a temporary office in Dhaka, Bangladesh. == Projects and initiatives == === Wikimedia Bangladesh projects === Name: Bengali Wikipedia Description: online encyclopedia Website: Name: Bengali Wiktionary Description: online dictionary and thesaurus Website: Name: Bengali Wikisource Description: digital library Website: Name: Bengali Wikibooks Description: collection of textbooks Website: === Current native projects === Bengali language (`bn`) projects Name Type Language Local name Bengali Wikipedia Wikipedia Bengali উইকিপিডিয়া Bengali Wiktionary Wiktionary Bengali উইকিঅভিধান Bengali Wikisource Wikisource Bengali উইকিসংকলন Bengali Wikibooks Wikibooks Bengali উইকিবই Bishnupriya Manipuri (`bpy`) language projects Name Type Language Local name Bishnupriya Manipuri Wikipedia Wikipedia Bishnupriya Manipuri উইকিপিডিয়া ==References== == Other websites == * * Wikimedia website * Wikimedia Bangladesh on Meta-Wiki * The Wikimedia Bangladesh bylaws on Meta wiki Category:Wikimedia Category:Organisations based in Bangladesh
title: Wikimedia Bangladesh
